# RETO 1.P11: Domina la memoria de vídeo
Copia más abajo tus programas, cada uno en su parte del reto.

# PROGRAMAS

## Actividad 1: Dibujo de 4x8 píxeles
Las 8 primeras fílas de pantalla, de distintos colores
```
21 0F 00 22 00 C0 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
21 00 00 22 00 C8 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
21 F0 00 22 00 D0 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
21 FF 00 22 00 D8 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
21 0F 00 22 00 E0 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
21 00 00 22 00 E8 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
21 F0 00 22 00 F0 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
21 FF 00 22 00 F8 18 FE 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
```
PC: 4000

## Actividad 2: Subrayar 'READY' de colores
8 filas de píxeles de distintos colores subrayando toda la palabra de Ready (40 píxeles)
```
21 0F 0F 22 70 C3 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
21 0F 0F 22 71 C3 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
21 0F 0F 22 72 C3 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
21 0F 0F 22 73 C3 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
21 0F 0F 22 74 C3 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
21 0F 0F 22 75 C3 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
21 0F 0F 22 76 C3 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
21 0F 0F 22 77 C3 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
21 0F 0F 22 78 C3 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
21 0F 0F 22 79 C3 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
21 00 00 22 70 CB 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
21 00 00 22 71 CB 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
21 00 00 22 72 CB 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
21 00 00 22 73 CB 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
21 00 00 22 74 CB 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
21 00 00 22 75 CB 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
21 00 00 22 76 CB 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
21 00 00 22 77 CB 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
21 00 00 22 78 CB 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
21 00 00 22 79 CB 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
21 F0 F0 22 70 D3 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
21 F0 F0 22 71 D3 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
21 F0 F0 22 72 D3 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
21 F0 F0 22 73 D3 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
21 F0 F0 22 74 D3 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
21 F0 F0 22 75 D3 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
21 F0 F0 22 76 D3 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
21 F0 F0 22 77 D3 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00

21 F0 F0 22 79 D3 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00

21 FF FF 22 76 DB 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
21 FF FF 22 77 DB 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
21 FF FF 22 78 DB 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
21 FF FF 22 79 DB 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
21 0F 0F 22 70 E3 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
```

## Actividad 3: Rectángulo de 2 colores y 2 píxeles de ancho
Alrededor del texto `1.1` que va después de BASIC.
```
21 FF FF 22 3E FA 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
21 FF FF 22 3F FA 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
21 FF FF 22 40 FA 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
21 FF FF 22 41 FA 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
21 FF FF 22 42 FA 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
21 FF FF 22 8E C2 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
21 FF FF 22 8F C2 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
21 FF FF 22 90 C2 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
21 FF FF 22 91 C2 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
21 FF FF 22 92 C2 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
21 FF FF 22 8E FA 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
21 FF FF 22 8F FA 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
21 FF FF 22 90 FA 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
21 FF FF 22 91 FA 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
21 FF FF 22 92 FA 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
21 FF FF 22 DE C2 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
21 FF FF 22 DF C2 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
21 FF FF 22 E0 C2 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
21 FF FF 22 E1 C2 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
21 FF FF 22 E2 C2 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
3E 03 32 3D FA 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
3E 03 32 8D C2 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
3E 03 32 8D CA 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
3E 03 32 8D D2 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
3E 03 32 8D DA 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
3E 03 32 8D E2 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
3E 03 32 8D EA 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
3E 03 32 8D F2 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
3E 03 32 8D FA 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
3E 03 32 DD C2 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
3E 0C 32 44 FA 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
3E 0C 32 94 C2 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
3E 0C 32 94 CA 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
3E 0C 32 94 D2 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
3E 0C 32 94 DA 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
3E 0C 32 94 E2 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
3E 0C 32 94 EA 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
3E 0C 32 94 F2 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
3E 0C 32 94 FA 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
3E 0C 32 94 C2 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
3E 0C 32 E4 C2 18 FE 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
```
PC: 4000

## Actividad 4: Cara de un dado de 8x7 píxeles
Debe estar, más o menos, en el centro de la pantalla (no tiene porqué ser exacto)
```
21 F0 F0 22 39 C4 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
21 F6 F6 22 39 CC 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
21 F0 F0 22 39 D4 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
21 F6 F6 22 39 DC 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
21 F0 F0 22 39 E4 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
21 F6 F6 22 39 EC 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 
21 F0 F0 22 39 F4 18 FE 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
```
PC: 4000
